price: But whoever repents and believes, and does righteous deeds, he will be among the successful.
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
